00024     /* @brief constructor */
00025 Accumulator::Accumulator()
00026 {
00027     // set initial value to the internal Accu variable
00028     Accu = 0.0f;
00029
00030     // Ask to the service factory to create a Service. The service is not
00031     // register yet.
00032     MyAssociatedService = ServiceFactory.Create( "Accumulator" );
00033     if ( MyAssociatedService == (Service *)NULL )
00034     {
00035         OmiscidError( "Could not register the Accumulator service.\n" );
00036         return;
00037     }
00038
00039     /*
00040     // Service is created, add multiples variables for testing purpose
00041     for( int i = 0 ; i < 200 ; i++ )
00042     {
00043         SimpleString var = "v";
00044         var += i;
00045         MyAssociatedService->AddVariable(var, "bla", "bla", ReadWriteAccess);
00046         // Set the variable value without checking it with internal controls
00047         MyAssociatedService->SetVariableValue(var, "a", true);
00048     } */
00049
00050     // Just add an Omiscid Variable in ReadAccess mode (read only) that can not
00051     // be modifies by other services.
00052     MyAssociatedService->AddVariable( "Accu", "float", "Accumulator value", ReadWriteAccess );
00053     // Set its value to the starting value
00054     MyAssociatedService->SetVariableValue( "Accu", 0.0f, true );
00055
00056     // Add a Connector to receive and send messages (AnInOutput) and set myself as callback
00057     // object to receive notification of messages
00058     MyAssociatedService->AddConnector( "Commands", "Input for commands. output of errors.", AnInOutput );
00059     MyAssociatedService->AddConnectorListener( "Commands", this );
00060
00061     // register the service and launch everything
00062     MyAssociatedService->Start();
00063
00064     // Trace
00065     OmiscidError( "Accumulator service started.\n" );
00066 }
00067
00068     /* @brief destructor */
00069 Accumulator::~Accumulator()
00070 {
00071     if ( MyAssociatedService != (Service *)NULL )
00072     {
00073         delete MyAssociatedService;
00074     }
00075 }
00076
00077     /* @brief callback function to receive data */
00078 void Accumulator::MessageReceived(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, const Message& Msg)
00079 {
00080     // Error management
00081     bool IsWrong = true;        // by default, the command is wrong
00082     SimpleString ErrorMessage = "Bad command.";
00083
00084     // Used to read operand ?
00085     float fRightOperand = 0.0f;
00086
00087     // A pointer to the command line and to the begining of the usufull data
00088     char * Command;
00089     int  StartUsefullInfo;
00090
00091     // parse string to understand command
00092     // Start lock myself using my mutex (needed if multiple clients)
00093     SmartLocker SL_Locker(Locker);
00094
00095     // Get the pointer to the data
00096     Command = Msg.GetBuffer();
00097
00098     // skip data while there are spaces...
00099     for( StartUsefullInfo = 0; Command[StartUsefullInfo] != '\0'; StartUsefullInfo++ )
00100     {
00101         if ( Command[StartUsefullInfo] != ' ' &&  Command[StartUsefullInfo] != '\t' &&
00102              Command[StartUsefullInfo] != '\r' && Command[StartUsefullInfo] != '\n' )
00103         {
00104             break;
00105         }
00106     }
00107
00108     // Is it a legal command ?
00109     if ( Command[StartUsefullInfo] == '-' || Command[StartUsefullInfo] == '+' ||
00110             Command[StartUsefullInfo] == '/' || Command[StartUsefullInfo] == '*' ||
00111             Command[StartUsefullInfo] == '=' )
00112     {
00113         // look for a float like 3.14 and then for
00114         if ( sscanf( &Command[StartUsefullInfo+1], "%f", &fRightOperand ) == 1 )
00115         {
00116             IsWrong = false;
00117         }
00118         // else IsWrong == true;
00119
00120         // If it is ok,
00121         if ( IsWrong == false )
00122         {
00123             // run the command
00124             switch( Command[StartUsefullInfo] )
00125             {
00126                 case '-':
00127                     // Compute new value
00128                     Accu -= fRightOperand;
00129                     break;
00130
00131                 case '+':
00132                     // Compute new value
00133                     Accu += fRightOperand;
00134                     break;
00135
00136                 case '*':
00137                     // Compute new value
00138                     Accu *= fRightOperand;
00139                     break;
00140
00141                 case '/':
00142                     if ( fRightOperand == 0.0f )
00143                     {
00144                         // we can not divide by 0
00145                         IsWrong = true;
00146                     }
00147                     else
00148                     {
00149                         // Compute new value
00150                         Accu /= fRightOperand;
00151                     }
00152                     break;
00153
00154                 default:         // here, Command[0] == '='
00155                     Accu = fRightOperand;
00156                     break;
00157             }
00158         }
00159     }
00160     if ( IsWrong == false )
00161     {
00162         // export the new Accu value, so the clients will receive notification
00163         TheService.SetVariableValue("Accu", Accu);
00164     }
00165     else
00166     {
00167         // Discard value and send back to the rigth "person" an error message in safe mode (TCP)
00168         TheService.SendReplyToMessage( (char*)ErrorMessage.GetStr(), (int)ErrorMessage.GetLength(), Msg, false );
00169     }
00170
00171     // Unlock myself
00172     SL_Locker.Unlock();
00173 }

00176 #ifdef OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00177 
00178 #include "ClientAccumulator.h"
00179
00180 /* @brief main program entry for the Accumulator. No need to give parameter */
00181 int Omiscid::DoAccumulatorTest( int argc, char*argv[] )
00182 {
00183     // Create dynamically an accumulator sever
00184     Accumulator * pAccuServer = new Accumulator;
00185
00186 #ifdef DEBUG
00187     if ( pAccuServer == (Accumulator *)NULL )
00188     {
00189         printf( "Test failed.\n" );
00190         return -1;
00191     }
00192 #endif
00193 
00194     // Create clients for accumulators
00195     RunClientAccumulator * ClientsAccu = new RunClientAccumulator[2];
00196
00197 #ifdef DEBUG
00198     if ( ClientsAccu == (RunClientAccumulator *)NULL )
00199     {
00200         printf( "Test failed.\n" );
00201         return -1;
00202     }
00203 #endif
00204 
00205     // Start them
00206     ClientsAccu[0].Start();
00207     ClientsAccu[1].Start();
00208
00209     // Sleep for 60 seconds, clients runs for 30 seconds
00210     Sleep( 60*1000 );
00211
00212     // delete the Cliens
00213     delete [] ClientsAccu;
00214
00215     // Delete the accu server
00216     delete pAccuServer;
00217
00218     return 0;
00219 }
00220 #endif // OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
